Description: Ostracon, fragment from the body of a pale-red pottery wine-jar, interior grooved and exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip, with faint traces of 3 lines of black-painted hieratic text, apparently accounts, with one red line beneath and smudged red traces over left side of first line.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389865) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389865)
